workHistory.title: Lead Software Engineer
workHistory.description: Continued support and Development on the Pipeline application.  Started development on the Iaas platform utilizing packer and go to build the AWS platforms that our OpenShift platform can run on.

workHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer
workHistory.description: Lead a small team to develop two enterprise applications using a four-tier architecture (One for managing DST's big data platform, the second for managing DST's new cloud pipeline). I designed and developed an angular2 framework for developing these applications (including mocks system, authentication and authorization management, and unit tests). Lead the design of the API using SpringBoot for our server. These applications have been deployed to both Linux and on Openshift environments.

workHistory.title: Software Engineer
workHistory.description: DevOps: While retaining the support from my prior position started also managing servers, deployments of application, and developing multiple new applications. Developed some of DST first cloud native application using micro-services. Meanwhile up pushing for Api first approach in our application development. Also create a few cliâ€™s that allowed for generating both AngularJS and springboot application to get new development up and running faster.

workHistory.title: Senior Software Developer
workHistory.description: Solo web support person for up to 7 applications at the same time. Managed and maintained reporting of all security vulnerabilities for our business sector. I also was the solo developer for fixing security vulnerabilities of my application. Lead the architecture and development of an application rewrite from flex to ExtJs.

workHistory.title: Staff Software Developer
workHistory.description: Developed and Lead the Ticket assignment system for pooled client support (assigning work to associates domestic and abroad). Supporting multiple clients from daily mainframe maintenances to supporting web applications (where I was a SME). Designed multiple intraday scans for client reporting.

workHistory.title: Software Developer
workHistory.description: Client mainframe support. Design and managed overseas teams for new application development. Managed SLA reporting and played a primary role in 3 successful conversions.
